title: MPCA SEM 4 ISA
content:
It was a horrible paper 
First of all what were the 4 markers ????? Ewwww 
They asked branch predictions for 1 marks?? 
Are you kidding me ? Moreover the paper was lengthy 
There was nothing mentioned about branch prediction on pesu 
SENIORS WHAT TO DO HOW TO STUDY MPCA AND FROM WHERE ??

comments.body:
>There was nothing mentioned about branch prediction on pesu

Bruh have you even gone thru the slides?
Yeah but it wasn't taught in our class and moreover no solved example was there
Bruh just open the anchor slides , there's a solved example for each and every case

Fuck MPCA, now I fucking hate that subject. This shit partially feels like 1st sem physics (in the sense the course might be structured really bad). MPCA course itself is so fucking hard in which it takes so much time for me to understand a single concept.
Hey i don't think so that the subject is difficult it's really easy just that the questions asked were horrible
Ah yes, the questions are so retarded. Whoever made the questions might've been retarded. I'm calling them retarded because they don't understand our struggle and I find MPCA to be very confusing.
It's a course in 4th sem CS. It's called a microprocessor and computer architecture.
